lyrics.text: Lesson 72. A car called Bluebird. First listen and then answer the question. What mistake
lyrics.translation: 第72课。一辆叫做蓝鸟的汽车。首先听，然后回答问题。什么错误

lyrics.text: was made? The great racing driver, Sir Malcolm Campbell, was the first man to drive at over
lyrics.translation: 制造的？伟大的赛车手，马尔科姆·坎贝尔爵士，是第一个以超过

lyrics.text: 300 miles per hour. He set up a new world record in September 1935 at Bonville Salt Flats, Utah.
lyrics.translation: 每小时300英里。他在1935年9月在犹他州的邦维尔盐滩创造了新的世界纪录。

lyrics.text: Bluebird, the car he was driving, had been specially built for him. It was over 30 feet in length
lyrics.translation: 蓝鸟，他驾驶的这辆车，是特别为他建造的。它的长度超过30英尺。

lyrics.text: and had a 2,500 horsepower engine. Although Campbell reached a speed of over 304 miles per
lyrics.translation: 并且拥有一台2500马力的引擎。尽管坎贝尔的速度超过了每小时304英里

lyrics.text: hour, he had great difficulty in controlling the car because a tire burst during the first run.
lyrics.translation: 小时，他在控制汽车时遇到了很大困难，因为在第一次行驶过程中一个轮胎爆裂了。

lyrics.text: After his attempt, Campbell was disappointed to learn that his average speed had been 299 miles
lyrics.translation: 尝试之后，坎贝尔失望地得知他的平均速度是299英里

lyrics.text: per hour. However, a few days later he was told that a mistake had been made.
lyrics.translation: 每小时。然而，几天后他被告知犯了一个错误。

lyrics.text: His average speed had been 301 miles per hour. Since that time, racing drivers have reached speeds
lyrics.translation: 他的平均速度是每小时301英里。从那时起，赛车手已经达到了速度

lyrics.text: over 600 miles an hour. Following in his father's footsteps, many years later, Sir Malcolm's son,
lyrics.translation: 超过600英里每小时。多年后，马尔科姆爵士的儿子继承了父亲的足迹，

lyrics.text: Donald, also set up a world record. Like his father, he was driving a car called Bluebird.
lyrics.translation: 唐纳德也创下了一项世界纪录。像他的父亲一样，他驾驶的是一辆名为蓝鸟的汽车。
